images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful, 19-year-old Japanese gravure idol engaging in a flirtatious shopping haul pose in a gym, her flawless skin texture revealing visible pores and faint vellus hair under the glow of handheld sparklers. She wears a daring, high-cut swimsuit that accentuates her curvy, fit silhouette and slim waist, the fabric sleek and form-fitting against her body. The scene is set during the blue hour with underexposed low-key color grading, creating a moody yet clear atmosphere. She is peeking playful and cute from behind a gym bench, locking eyes with the camera with a seductive smile, the bright sparks of the handheld fireworks casting dynamic, flattering highlights on her face. Captured with a Sony A7R IV and an 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, the background features a blurred gym mirror reflecting the neon city lights, utilizing depth of field, ray tracing, and global illumination for a cinematic, viral Instagram aesthetic.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
